message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. After careful consideration, I believe it would be beneficial for both of us if you were to acquire this item. My initial offer for the product is $12000.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10000. I'm willing to pay a premium for the product, but I need to stay within my budget.
Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and am willing to negotiate further. My counteroffer for the product is $11500.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $11000?
Thank you for your offer, Bob. Considering the value of the product and its unique features, I believe we can reach an agreement. My counteroffer is $11250.
I understand the value of the product, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $11000?
Thank you for your persistence, Bob. I appreciate your interest in our product. My final counteroffer is $11125.
I'm getting close to my budget limit, but I'm still willing to negotiate. Would you be willing to meet me at $10900?
I see you're trying to find a balance, Bob. I'm glad we're making progress. My final counteroffer is $11000.
I'm really close to my budget limit, but I'm willing to make one last attempt. Would you be willing to meet me at $10950?
